remarks: An image of a filter element is in the image filter.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 5-Oct-2009.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Aug-2015.)
statement:
imaelfm.l $e |- L = ( Y filGen B ) $.
imaelfm $p |- ( ( ( X e. A /\ B e. ( fBas ` Y ) /\ F : Y --> X ) /\ S e. L ) -> ( F " S ) e. ( ( X FilMap F ) ` B ) ) $.
